profile.title: Driven by Code, Powered by Curiosity
profile.location: Ciudad Aut√≥noma de Buenos Aires, Argentina

description.text1: üí° I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer and Cloud Engineer Trainee from Argentina, currently pursuing an Advanced Technical Degree in Software Development.
description.text2: üíª At just 22 years old, I bring a unique blend of technical proficiency, adaptability, and genuine curiosity that drives me to constantly push my limits and deliver meaningful solutions.
description.text3: üå± I thrive in dynamic environments where learning and collaboration are key. My current focus is on cloud technologies‚Äîespecially Microsoft Azure‚Äîwhere I'm gaining hands-on experience with scalable and secure architectures. On the development side, I work confidently across the full stack: from building robust back-end services with Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, and Express.js, to crafting responsive front-end interfaces using Angular, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
description.text4: ü§ù I'm well-versed in tools like Docker, Git, Postman, and collaborative platforms like GitHub, Jira, and Notion, which help me integrate seamlessly into agile teams and contribute effectively from day one. Whether I'm debugging code, deploying to the cloud, or participating in code reviews, I bring a results-driven mindset and strong communication skills that foster trust and high performance.
description.text5: üåê Fluent in Spanish and with an upper-intermediate (B2) level of English, I'm comfortable working in diverse, international teams and always eager to learn from those around me.
description.text6: üöÄ If you're looking for someone who's not just technically skilled but also deeply invested in personal and professional growth, let's connect. I'm excited to bring value, learn fast, and grow even faster.

description.text1: üéì I will soon begin the third year, first semester of the Advanced Technical Degree in Software Development, a rigorous programme focused on real-world application of programming, systems analysis, and cloud-based solutions.
description.text2: ‚úíÔ∏è With 18 out of 23 subjects already completed, I've built a strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, object-oriented programming, databases, and agile methodologies. My academic journey blends technical depth with practical skills, preparing me to face challenges with both precision and adaptability.
description.text3: üíº This curriculum aligns perfectly with my hands-on experience in full-stack development and cloud engineering. It allows me to continuously connect what I learn in the classroom with what I build in the real world.

description.text1: üìä I'm currently enrolled in a 4-month intensive training programme focused on cloud technologies, data, and low-code development, with a strong emphasis on Microsoft Azure.
description.text2: üß∞ This hands-on experience is helping me build solid foundations in cloud infrastructure and scalable architectures. I'm preparing for the AZ-900 (Azure Fundamentals) certification, with AZ-104 (Azure Administrator) as my next milestone to deepen my skills in cloud management.
description.text3: üß† More than just theory, this programme is sharpening my ability to think strategically, solve real-world problems, and contribute effectively in team-driven environments‚Äîpaving the way for my future in cloud engineering.

projects.title: From Idea to Code
projects.description: Each project is the result of curiosity, research, and hands-on problem-solving ‚Äî transforming ideas into scalable and meaningful digital solutions.

description.text1: ‚Ä¢ Develop a product, customer, and sales management system using a multi-layered architecture.
description.text2: ‚Ä¢ Implement CRUD operations with entity relationships using JPA/Hibernate and PostgreSQL.
description.text3: ‚Ä¢ Automate deployment with Docker and Render, solving connection and configuration issues.
description.text4: ‚Ä¢ Apply best practices, design patterns, and manage dependencies with Maven.

description.text1: ‚Ä¢ Develop an application for managing a dog grooming service.
description.text2: ‚Ä¢ Implement functionalities to register, view, edit, and delete information about dogs and their owners.
description.text3: ‚Ä¢ Design a user-friendly and intuitive graphical interface using Swing.
description.text4: ‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality by applying good practices and development standards.

description.text1: ‚Ä¢ Implement an efficient and functional book search engine.
description.text2: ‚Ä¢ Integrate the Gutendex API to retrieve book data.
description.text3: ‚Ä¢ Design an architecture based on patterns such as model, repository, and service.
description.text4: ‚Ä¢ Manage a PostgreSQL database to store and query information.

description.text1: ‚Ä¢ Create a currency converter with Java.

description.text3: ‚Ä¢ Implement the design made in Figma into code using HTML and CSS.
description.text4: ‚Ä¢ Create a responsive design for different screen resolutions.

description.text1: ‚Ä¢ Design and structure web pages using HTML.
description.text2: ‚Ä¢ Style and format with CSS to ensure an attractive and functional user experience.
